page.title: 12FAVOURITE GAMES - continued
page.content: STUART'S FAVOURITE GAME is 'skilly'. "In this game there are two teams each with ten people in. One team runs away the other team counts to ten and then they try to catch the other team. When they do they say 'skilly one, two, three, caught by me, no escapes.' That person is then taken back to base. When all the team is caught the team that was chasing in the first game then becomes the chasers. OTHER CHILDREN'S FAVOURITE GAMES "We like to play racing games. We line up and someone says 'Go' and we run to a finish line. The lst. person past the line is the winner. We sometimes have hopping, skipping, and bouncing a ball while we are running races.
